SELECT * FROM gatherTbl WHERE isDeleted = 0
or isTogether = #{isTogether}
or title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')

select * from ( select g.postId, g.uid, g.title, g.content, g.maxMember, g.image, g.price, g.deliveryFee, g.category, g.deadline, g.postState, g.isTogether, g.postedDate, g.isRevised, g.revisedDate, g.isDeleted, g.deletedDate, g.viewCount, u.nickname, u.address, u.region1, u.region2, u.region3, IFNULL(c.CNT, 0) as chatNum from gatherTbl g left outer join userTbl u on g.uid = u.uid left outer join (select postId, count(distinct uid) as CNT from chattbl group by postId) as c on g.postId = c.postId where g.isDeleted = 0
and title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%' ) OR region3 like concat('%',#{keyword},'%' )
and isTogether = 1
and isTogether = 0
) as T1 order by postState, deadline

select count(*) from gatherTbl g left outer join userTbl u on g.uid = u.uid where isDeleted = 0
and title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
